title: "The Esoteric Meanings of Planetary Colors and Vocal Correspondences"
first_phrase: In the previous section, we learned about the physiological effects of observing natural phenomena such as the reflections of light. We also explored the symbolism of different planets, including the feminine power of Venus and the masculine power of Mars. Now, we delve into the vocal aspects of ancient correspondences, including the idea that vowels correspond to different areas of the body. Finally, we learn about the hermetic seal, which integrates planetary energies and allows for the transmutation of energy. As Plato said, there are two types of divine powers, internal and external. This section explores how the hermetic seal allows us to tap into our internal power and overcome our external distractions.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the knowledge of the power of colors and vowels, in combination with the practice of Hermetic sealing, can lead to a greater connection with our center and higher states of consciousness. Overcoming the fear of "nothingness" is possible with a focused and disciplined approach to inner exploration.
